TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TagPrefixAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class TagPrefixAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class TagPrefixAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义在网页中用于标识自定义控件的标记前缀。

span.span: Defines the tag prefix used in a Web page to identify custom controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类定义指定的自定义控件的标记前缀别名所需的程序集级别属性。The class defines an assembly-level attribute needed to specify tag prefix aliases for custom controls. 如 Microsoft Visual Studio 工具使用此属性自动生成`Register`指令在其中使用了自定义控件的 ASP.NET 页。This attribute is used by tools such as Microsoft Visual Studio to automatically generate a `Register` directive in the ASP.NET page where the custom controls are used. 此指令注册命名空间的标记前缀。This directive registers the tag prefix with a namespace. 此外，它指定的自定义控件代码实现所在的程序集。Moreover, it specifies the assembly where the custom control code implementation resides. 此指令后，你可以使用自定义控件在网页中以声明方式。With this directive in place, you can use custom controls in a Web page declaratively. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TagPrefixAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TagPrefixAttribute/CS/tagprefixattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TagPrefixAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TagPrefixAttribute/VB/tagprefixattribute.vb#1)]

span.span: A string that identifies the custom control namespace.

param.span: 标识自定义控件前缀的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the custom control prefix.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在定义自定义控件，以及在任何代码之前，应按以下方式调用此类构造函数：In defining your custom control, and prior to any code, you should invoke this class constructor as follows: `[assembly:TagPrefix(namespace, tag)]` ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义程序集级别属性，可用于指定自定义控件的标记前缀别名。The following code example shows how to define an assembly-level attribute that enables you to specify a tag prefix alias for a custom control. 如 Microsoft Visual Studio 工具使用此属性自动生成`@ Register`指令在其中使用了自定义控件的网页。This attribute is used by tools such as Microsoft Visual Studio to automatically generate a `@ Register` directive in Web pages where the custom controls are used. [!code-csharp[SystemWebUI_TagPrefixAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TagPrefixAttribute/CS/tagprefixattribute.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SystemWebUI_TagPrefixAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SystemWebUI_TagPrefixAttribute/VB/tagprefixattribute.vb#1)]

exception.span: 或 为 或空字符串 ("")。

span.span: The or the is or an empty string ("").
